head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HEYMANN, PAULA (NEE KAMNITZ)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HEYMANN, PAULA (NEE KAMNITZ)

block.p: HEYMANN-Paula (nee Kamnitz). Died December 29, 1999, beloved wife of Werner, loving mother of Gerard and Susan Heymann, JoAnn and Mark Laifer and Andrew and Ophelia Heymann. Cherished grandmother of Harrison, Julia and Grant. Dear sister of Allen and Helen Kamnitz and aunt of Pamela & Gail. Graveside services will be held Sunday, 11 A.M., at New Montefiore Cemetery.

HEYMANN-Paula (nee Kamnitz). Died December 29, 1999, beloved wife of Werner, loving mother of Gerard and Susan Heymann, JoAnn and Mark Laifer and Andrew and Ophelia Heymann. Cherished grandmother of Harrison, Julia and Grant. Dear sister of Allen and Helen Kamnitz and aunt of Pamela & Gail. Graveside services will be held Sunday, 11 A.M., at New Montefiore Cemetery.
